Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local torso = nil local sticky = false local welds = {} local touched = false local coolDown = 0 --local origLookVector = nil local debris = game:GetService("Debris") --[[ local stickyLeftFire = Instance.new("Fire") stickyLeftFire.Color = Color3.new(0,102/255,1) stickyLeftFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0,0,102/255) stickyLeftFire.Heat = -3 stickyLeftFire.Size = 3
local stickyRightFire = stickyLeftFire:clone()
local bodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce")
local bodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bodyPos.P = 5000000 bodyPos.D = 5000 bodyPos.maxForce = Vector3.new(bodyPos.P,0,bodyPos.P)
local bodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bodyGyro.P = 5000000 bodyGyro.D = 5000 bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bodyGyro.P,bodyGyro.P,bodyGyro.P)]]
function onEquipped() torso = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") end
function onUnequipped() --[[bodyGyro.Parent = nil bodyForce.Parent = nil bodyPos.Parent = nil origLookVector = nil stickyLeftFire.Parent = nil stickyRightFire.Parent = nil]] sticky = false Tool.Handle.Sparkles.Enabled = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
function onActivated() if coolDown > 0 then return end
sticky = not sticky if not sticky then onUnequipped() Tool.Handle.Sparkles.Enabled = false else Tool.Handle.Sparkles.Enabled = true end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) --[[ function getMass()
local mass = 0 local parts = torso.Parent:GetChildren() for i = 1, #parts do
if parts[i].className == "Part" then mass = mass + parts[i]:GetMass() elseif parts[i].className == "Hat" or parts[i].className == "Tool" then mass = mass + parts[i].Handle:GetMass() end
end
return mass
end
function runUpWall() while sticky do if torso.Position.y > height + torso.Size.y then sticky = false bodyForce.Parent = nil stickyLeftFire.Parent = nil stickyRightFire.Parent = nil bodyPos.Parent = nil bodyGyro.Parent = nil
local forwardForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") forwardForce.force = Vector3.new(origLookVector.x * getMass() * 40, 0, origLookVector.z * getMass() * 40) forwardForce.Parent = torso wait(0.5) forwardForce:remove() end wait()
end end]]
function elevate(elevator)
while torso.Position.y < height + torso.Size.y and elevator.Parent == game.Workspace do wait() end
Tool.Handle.Sparkles.Enabled = false -- never made it to the top, so get out of here if elevator.Parent ~= game.Workspace then return end
elevator.Bottom.BodyVelocity.velocity = elevator.Bottom.BodyVelocity.velocity * 0.1
wait(5)
for i = 1, #welds do welds[i]:remove() end
elevator.Bottom.BodyVelocity:remove() elevator.Bottom.Velocity = Vector3.new(math.random(3,4),-20,math.random(-3,-1)) elevator.Top.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,20,0) elevator.BackGlass.Velocity = Vector3.new(elevator.BackGlass.CFrame.lookVector.x * 20,0,elevator.BackGlass.CFrame.lookVector.z * 20) elevator.LeftGlass.Velocity = Vector3.new(elevator.LeftGlass.CFrame.lookVector.x * 20,0,elevator.LeftGlass.CFrame.lookVector.z * 20) elevator.RightGlass.Velocity = Vector3.new(elevator.RightGlass.CFrame.lookVector.x * 20,0,elevator.RightGlass.CFrame.lookVector.z * 20)
elevator.fireEmitter.Fire.Enabled = false
end
function weldElevator(elevator)
local leftGlassWeld = Instance.new("Weld") leftGlassWeld.Part0 = elevator.Bottom leftGlassWeld.Parent = elevator.Bottom leftGlassWeld.Part1 = elevator.LeftGlass leftGlassWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(5,5.2,0) table.insert(welds,leftGlassWeld)
local rightGlassWeld = Instance.new("Weld") rightGlassWeld.Part0 = elevator.Bottom rightGlassWeld.Parent = elevator.Bottom rightGlassWeld.Part1 = elevator.RightGlass rightGlassWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(-5,5.2,0) table.insert(welds,rightGlassWeld)
local backGlassWeld = Instance.new("Weld") backGlassWeld.Part0 = elevator.Bottom backGlassWeld.Parent = elevator.Bottom backGlassWeld.Part1 = elevator.BackGlass backGlassWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,5.2,-5) backGlassWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0) table.insert(welds,backGlassWeld)
local leftSupportBeamWeld = Instance.new("Weld") leftSupportBeamWeld.Part0 = elevator.Bottom leftSupportBeamWeld.Parent = elevator.Bottom leftSupportBeamWeld.Part1 = elevator.LeftSupportBeam leftSupportBeamWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(3.5,5.2,4.5) leftSupportBeamWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0) table.insert(welds,leftSupportBeamWeld)
local rightSupportBeamWeld = Instance.new("Weld") rightSupportBeamWeld.Part0 = elevator.Bottom rightSupportBeamWeld.Parent = elevator.Bottom rightSupportBeamWeld.Part1 = elevator.RightSupportBeam rightSupportBeamWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(-3.5,5.2,4.5) rightSupportBeamWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0) table.insert(welds,rightSupportBeamWeld)
local topWeld = Instance.new("Weld") topWeld.Part0 = elevator.Bottom topWeld.Parent = elevator.Bottom topWeld.Part1 = elevator.Top topWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,10.8,0) table.insert(welds,topWeld)
local fireEmitter = Instance.new("Part") fireEmitter.Name = "fireEmitter" fireEmitter.Transparency = 1 fireEmitter.Parent = elevator
local fireWeld = Instance.new("Weld") fireWeld.Part0 = elevator.Bottom fireWeld.Parent = elevator.Bottom fireWeld.Part1 = elevator.fireEmitter fireWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,-4,0)
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Heat = -20 fire.Size = 12 fire.Color = Color3.new(1,102/255,1) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(102/255,0,102/255) fire.Parent = elevator.fireEmitter
end
function onTouched(part)
if not sticky or touched then return end if not part:IsA("MeshPart") and part.Shape ~= Enum.PartType.Block then return end
touched = true sticky = false
welds = {}
local oldPos = torso.Position
--This call will cause a "wait" until the data comes back local elevator = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32094048)
local instances = elevator:GetChildren() if #instances == 0 then elevator:Remove() return nil end elevator = elevator:FindFirstChild("elevator") weldElevator(elevator)
torso.Parent:MoveTo(torso.Position - (torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit * 7))
elevator.Parent = game.Workspace elevator:MoveTo(torso.Position)
elevator.Bottom.BodyGyro.cframe = torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi,0) elevator.Bottom.BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(1 * torso.CFrame.lookVector.x,8,1 * torso.CFrame.lookVector.z)
local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = elevator.Bottom weld.Parent = elevator.Bottom weld.Part1 = torso.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Leg") or torso.Parent:FindFirstChild("RightUpperLeg") weld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,1.7,0)
height = part.Position.y + part.Size.y/2
debris:AddItem(weld,1.5) debris:AddItem(elevator,20)
Tool.Handle.Sound:Play() elevate(elevator) coolDown = 20 Tool.Handle.Sound:Stop() wait(coolDown) coolDown = 0
touched = false
--[[ stickyLeftFire.Parent = torso.Parent:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") stickyRightFire.Parent = torso.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Leg")
origLookVector = torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit origLookVector = Vector3.new(origLookVector.x/math.abs(origLookVector.x + origLookVector.z),0,origLookVector.z/math.abs(origLookVector.x + origLookVector.z))
bodyGyro.Parent = torso bodyGyro.cframe = torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0)
bodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0,getMass() * 230,0) bodyForce.Parent = torso
bodyPos.position = torso.Position bodyPos.Parent = torso
runUpWall()]]
end
Tool.Handle.Touched:connect(onTouched)
